discourse_list.title: Lost founds with Wrong Network xDai And DAI

content.content: Hello, Guys. I think I did a terrible thing! I send DAI from my Binance account to my xDAI nifty wallet, transaction was successful, I didn’t receive nothing. What can I do in this case? DAI Transaction details Exchange: Binance.US Amount: 2,721.91536 DAI Address: 0x7393F0546ddD64D39B568973DAdC3B1fcB11b7e4 TxID: 0x14833dc69d8cbd0fab5477ebc1aba521cd0916886f65a90723d5cb4a59894c7e Network: ETH Date: Nov 15, 2021 23:38:58

Bro, binance support usually helps with those cases as it is something from the exchange itself, they usually return the funds but you have to write to support or live chat. Explain your case calmly and clearly, and they will be able to help you. Good luck bro.
